title: Get State Pension Calculation request schema

nino.description: The Individuals National Insurance number with or without the suffix character.

checkBrick.description: First 3 characters of the Individuals surname and 2 initials.

finalise.description: Final flag used to indicate this is a final calculation request.

fryAmount.description: Total amount of earnings missing in the Final Relevant Year (FRY). This can only be supplied if finalise is true.
